Word at Fudan is supported by NSFC 11825403, the Special Funds for Major State Basic
Research (Grant No. 2015CB921700), the Program for Professor of Special Appointment
(Eastern Scholar), the Qing Nian Ba Jian Program, and the Fok Ying Tung Education
Foundation. K.L. thanks Junsheng Feng for useful discussions.
H.X. and S.P. proposed the concept and supervised the project. K.L. performed the ﬁrst-
principles calculations with the help from W.L. The group theory and
carried out by K.L. with the help of W.L., J.J. and P.B. K.L. prepared the initial draft of the
paper. All authors contributed to the writing and revision of the paper.
The authors declare no competing interests.
